macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: Major U.S. indexes gain Friday after cooler CPI data and Nvidia-led rebound
items.summary: The S&P 500 rose 0.9% to 6,834.50, the Nasdaq gained 1.3% to 23,307.62, and the Dow added 0.4% to 48,134.89 as AI and big-tech names rallied following softer inflation signals and positive corporate headlines[3][1].

items.title: Weekly market recap: tech drags broader indices amid still-resilient economy
items.summary: Over the week equities were choppy—S&P 500 and Nasdaq showed notable volatility with weakness concentrated in mega-cap tech and AI-exposed stocks, leaving equal-weight and value-oriented benchmarks relatively stronger[2].

items.title: Bank of Japan raises rate to highest in 30 years; Japanese stocks rise
items.summary: The Bank of Japan lifted its benchmark interest rate to its highest level in three decades, and Japanese equities closed higher on the move[3].

items.title: Corporate earnings/moves: Oracle joins U.S. TikTok JV; Winnebago beats estimates
items.summary: Oracle rallied after joining a new joint venture related to TikTok in the U.S., while Winnebago reported profits and revenue above expectations; Nike traded down in pre-market after mixed investor reaction to results[3][1].

items.title: Market breadth and sector leadership Friday: Tech, healthcare, energy outperform
items.summary: Breadth favored advancers and sector leaders included Technology (+~1.6–2.1%), Health Care, and Energy, while Consumer Staples and Utilities lagged during the session[1].

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: XRP ETFs continue strong inflows after 2025 regulatory settlement
items.summary: Institutional allocation into XRP-focused ETFs has accelerated following Ripple’s 2025 settlement with the SEC, driving roughly $423 million in inflows since mid-November and pushing ETF AUM for XRP toward $1 billion as investors favor payment-utility assets over pure speculation.

items.title: Coinbase publishes bullish 2026 market outlook highlighting RWA tokenization
items.summary: Coinbase's 2026 Crypto Market Outlook forecasts deeper institutional integration of crypto, emphasizing clearer regulation, growth of real-world-asset (RWA) tokenization, and infrastructure that could move digital assets toward core financial-system roles by 2026.

items.title: Institutional interest in Bitcoin as yield and portfolio diversifier grows
items.summary: Analysts and industry commentary argue institutions are increasingly viewing Bitcoin as a source of yield and a portfolio diversifier amid lower certainty in traditional 'risk-free' assets, supporting demand from long-term, yield-seeking investors.

items.title: Market commentary — mixed price action with select altcoin outperformers
items.summary: Market updates show mixed trading across major market-cap cryptocurrencies while smaller tokens SOPH, GIGGLE, and ANIME are listed as top daily outperformers with gains of roughly 45%, 26%, and 25% respectively in Binance's Dec. 20 market update.

items.title: Analysts and pundits predict renewed crypto price highs in 2026
items.summary: Various market commentators and analysts are projecting that improving liquidity trends, ETF flows, and institutional adoption could drive Bitcoin and broader crypto markets toward new highs in 2026, with some bullish price forecasts appearing in market roundups.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Nature Publishes Wearable AI Breakthrough for On-Device Frailty Assessment
items.summary: A new study in Nature Communications introduces a wearable AI device framework for continuous, on-device frailty assessment using gait analysis, matching gold standard diagnostics in trials with 16 and 14 participants. The system enables extended wear without user intervention, processing high-rate biosignals autonomously.

items.title: Nabla Announces Exclusive Partnership with Yann LeCun's Advanced Machine Intelligence
items.summary: On December 18, 2025, Nabla partnered with Yann LeCun's new AI firm for first access to world model technologies, aiming to develop FDA-certifiable agentic AI for healthcare beyond LLMs. The collaboration focuses on deterministic reasoning and handling continuous medical data.

items.title: AI Robotics Advances Highlighted: Combat Robots, Humanoids, and New Training Frameworks
items.summary: A recent YouTube update covers 2025 AI robotics progress including AI-powered combat robots, new humanoids from Unitree, Tesla Optimus, Figure, and Boston Dynamics' Atlas, plus Nvidia and Carnegie Mellon University's ASAP framework for agile robotics training.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Epic Games Store Offers Eternights as Free Game for December 19-20
items.summary: The Epic Games Store is giving away Eternights for free from December 19 to 20, 2025, continuing their daily free game promotion. Previous titles include Jotunslayer: Hordes of Hel and Hogwarts Legacy.

items.title: Steel Ball Run: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Anime Reveals New Trailer and Cast
items.summary: A new trailer for the Steel Ball Run anime adaptation of JoJo's Bizarre Adventure was released, announcing Episode 1 premiere on March 19, 2026, along with voice actors for Pocoloco and Sand Man.

items.title: Homebois vs Influence Rage Match Highlighted in Mobile Legends Esports Stream
items.summary: A rage match between Homebois and Influence in Mobile Legends Bang Bang featured intense plays, with Influence securing advantages in mid-lane and objectives during the December 19 stream.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: Netflix Acquires Gaming Avatar Maker Ready Player Me
items.summary: Netflix has acquired Ready Player Me, a company specializing in gaming avatars, to enhance its gaming offerings. The deal was announced on December 19, 2025.

items.title: Russia-Linked Hackers Launch Microsoft 365 Phishing Campaign
items.summary: Russia-linked hackers have initiated a phishing campaign targeting Microsoft 365 credentials, posing significant cybersecurity risks. The campaign was reported on December 19, 2025.

items.title: Google Sees 20% of AI Software Dev Hires as Former Employees Returning
items.summary: Google is experiencing a 'boomerang' hiring trend where one in five AI software developers hired in 2025 are former employees returning to the company. This was highlighted in reports from December 19, 2025.

items.title: New Report on Intelligent Shopping Carts Market Forecast 2025-2030
items.summary: Research and Markets released a global forecast for the intelligent shopping carts market, highlighting innovations from companies like Amazon, AiFi, and Standard Cognition. The report was published on December 19, 2025.

items.title: AI Hyperscalers Continue Bond Issuance for Data Center Expansion
items.summary: Major hyperscalers like Meta, Alphabet, and Amazon raised tens of billions in bonds last month to fund capital expenditures, with debt-to-cash ratios improving. Analysts note room for elevated debt issuance amid infrastructure builds, reported December 19, 2025.
